title: Designing Academic Information Literacy Education Using [Large-Scale] Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics knowledge and information retrieval experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning utilizing generative AI and open-license materials in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design academic information search strategies using generative AI prompt engineering techniques
Learners can analyze openly licensed math materials to develop educational content prototypes
Learners can develop an information credibility evaluation system using customized AI chatbot models

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
